holidays.name: National Mammoth Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the majestic Woolly Mammoth, those giant prehistoric elephants that roamed the Earth during the Ice Age.
holidays.origin: Started by paleontology enthusiasts to raise awareness about extinct species and the importance of biodiversity.
holidays.funFact: Some scientists are exploring the idea of 'de-extincting' mammoths using genetic engineering!

holidays.name: International Co-op Day

holidays.origin: Established by the International Cooperative Alliance, first celebrated in 1995 to promote cooperative principles.
holidays.funFact: Cooperatives operate in nearly every industry, from agriculture to banking, serving over a billion people globally!
